atk-s0511a9:1_0: Sobhitabuddhe pana parinibbute tassa aparabhāge ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṁ buddhuppādarahitaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0511a9:1_1: Atīte pana tasmiṁ asaṅkhyeyye ekasmiṁ kappe tayo buddhā nibbattiṁsu anomadassī, padumo, nāradoti.
atk-s0511a9:1_2: Tattha anomadassī bhagavā soḷasa asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā
atk-s0511a9:1_3: devehi abhiyācito tato cavitvā candavatiyaṁ nāma rājadhāniyaṁ yasavā nāmassa rañño kule samussitacārupayodharāya
atk-s0511a9:1_4: yasodharāya nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṁ paṭisandhiṁ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a9:1_5: Anomadassikumāre kira yasodharāya deviyā kucchigate tassa puññappabhāvena pabhā asītihatthappamāṇaṁ ṭhānaṁ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a9:1_7: Sā dasannaṁ māsānaṁ accayena bodhisattaṁ sucandanuyyāne vijāyi.
atk-s0511a9:2_1: yasmā jātiyaṁ ākāsato satta ratanāni patiṁsu,
atk-s0511a9:2_3: So anukkamena vuddhippatto dibbehi kāmaguṇehi paricāriyamāno dasavassasahassāni agāraṁ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0511a9:2_4: Tassa kira siri upasiri sirivaḍḍhoti tayo pāsādā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0511a9:2_6: So sirimāya deviyā upavāṇe nāma putte jāte cattāri nimittāni disvā sivikāyānena mahābhinikkhamanaṁ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a9:3_0: Tehi parivuto mahāpuriso dasa māse padhānacariyaṁ cari.
atk-s0511a9:3_1: Tato visākhapuṇṇamāya anupamabrāhmaṇagāme piṇḍāya caritvā anupamaseṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṁ madhupāyāsaṁ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0511a9:3_2: sālavane divāvihāraṁ vītināmetvā anomanāmājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā ajjunarukkhabodhiṁ
atk-s0511a9:3_3: padakkhiṇaṁ katvā aṭṭhattiṁsahatthavitthataṁ tiṇasantharaṁ santharitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṁ adhiṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṁ
atk-s0511a9:3_4: ābhujitvā samāraṁ mārabalaṁ viddhaṁsetvā tīsu yāmesu tisso vijjā uppādetvā –
atk-s0511a9:8_0: “So chetvā bandhanaṁ sabbaṁ, viddhaṁsetvā tayo bhave;
atk-s0511a9:15_0: Byāharantaṁ giraṁ sutvā, amataṁ pāpuṇanti te”ti.
atk-s0511a9:16_6: aññena devena vā mārena vā kenaci vā atikkamituṁ asakkuṇeyyoti attho.
atk-s0511a9:16_7: Sochetvā bandhanaṁ sabbanti sabbaṁ dasavidhaṁ saṁyojanaṁ chinditvā.
atk-s0511a9:16_8: Viddhaṁsetvā tayo bhaveti tibhavūpagaṁ kammaṁ kammakkhayakarañāṇena viddhaṁsetvā,
atk-s0511a9:16_10: Anivattigamanaṁ magganti nivattiyā pavattiyā paṭipakkhabhūtaṁ nibbānaṁ anivattīti vuccati,
atk-s0511a9:16_12: Taṁ anivattigamanaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ desesīti attho.
atk-s0511a9:17_1: Yathā hi samuddo caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro anekayojanasahassabhūtāvāso akkhobhiyo,
atk-s0511a9:17_3: Ākāsova anantoti yathā pana ākāsassa anto natthi,
atk-s0511a9:17_5: evaṁ bhagavāpi buddhaguṇehi ananto appameyyo apāro.
atk-s0511a9:17_7: Sālarājāva phullitoti sabbalakkhaṇānubyañjanasamalaṅkatasarīrattā suphullitasālarājā viya sobhatīti attho.
atk-s0511a9:17_8: Dassanenapi taṁ buddhanti tassa buddhassa dassanenāpīti attho.
atk-s0511a9:17_15: Teti ye tassa giraṁ dhammadesanaṁ suṇanti,
atk-s0511a9:18_0: Bhagavā pana bodhimūle sattasattāhaṁ vītināmetvā brahmunā āyācito dhammadesanāya buddhacakkhunā lokaṁ
atk-s0511a9:18_1: olokento attanā saha pabbajite tikoṭisaṅkhe jane upanissayasampanne disvā –
atk-s0511a9:18_2: “kattha nu kho te etarahi viharantī”ti upadhārento subhavatīnagare sudassanuyyāne viharante disvā ākāsena gantvā sudassanuyyāne otari.
atk-s0511a9:18_3: So tehi parivuto sadevamanussāya parisāya majjhe dhammacakkaṁ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a9:23_0: Athāparena samayena osadhīnagaradvāre asanarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ katvā asurehi durabhibhavane
atk-s0511a9:23_1: tāvatiṁsabhavane paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ nisinno temāsaṁ abhidhammavassaṁ vassāpayi.
atk-s0511a9:27_0: Tattha vassanteti buddhamahāmeghe vassante. Dhammavuṭṭhiyoti dhammakathāvassavuṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0511a9:28_0: Tato aparena samayena maṅgalapañhāniddese aṭṭhasattati koṭiyo abhisamiṁsu.
atk-s0511a9:33_1: Tattha soreyyanagare isidattassa rañño dhamme desiyamāne pasīditvā ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṁ
atk-s0511a9:33_4: Rādhavatīnagare sundarindharassa nāma rañño dhamme desiyamāne ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṁ sattannaṁ
atk-s0511a9:33_7: Puna soreyyanagareyeva soreyyaraññā saha ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṁ channaṁ arahantasatasahassānaṁ majjhe pātimokkhaṁ uddisi.
atk-s0511a9:46_0: Tattha tassāpi ca mahesinoti tassa mahesino anomadassissāpi.
atk-s0511a9:47_0: Anaṅgaṇānanti ettha ayaṁ aṅgaṇa-saddo katthaci kilesesu dissati. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a9:47_2: Rāgo aṅgaṇaṁ doso aṅgaṇaṁ moho aṅgaṇa”nti.
atk-s0511a9:47_6: “tasseva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya vāyamatī”ti.
atk-s0511a9:47_11: Tapassinanti kilesakkhayakaro ariyamaggasaṅkhāto tapo yesaṁ atthi te tapassino,
atk-s0511a9:48_0: Tadā amhākaṁ bodhisatto eko mahesakkho yakkhasenāpati ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo anekakoṭisatasahassānaṁ yakkhānaṁ adhipati.
atk-s0511a9:48_1: So “buddho loke uppanno”ti sutvā āgantvā paramaruciradassanaṁ sattaratanamayaṁ abhirucirarajanikaramaṇḍalasadisaṁ
atk-s0511a9:48_2: maṇḍapaṁ nimminitvā tattha sattāhaṁ mahādānaṁ buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa adāsi.
atk-s0511a9:48_3: Atha naṁ bhagavā bhattānumodanasamaye “anāgate kappasatasahassādhike ekasmiṁ asaṅkhyeyye atikkante gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0511a9:63_0: Tattha uttariṁ vatamadhiṭṭhāsinti pāramipūraṇatthāya bhiyyopi daḷhataraṁ parakkamamakāsīti attho.
atk-s0511a9:64_0: Tassa pana anomadassissa bhagavato candavatī nāma nagaraṁ ahosi,
atk-s0511a9:64_3: nisabho ca anomo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a9:64_5: sundarī ca sumanā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a9:64_13: Sivikāyānena gamanaṁ pana sobhitabuddhavaṁsavaṇṇanāya pāsādagamane vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0511a9:79_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṁ bahuṁ.
atk-s0511a9:84_0: “So ca satthā amitayaso, yugāni tāni atuliyāni;
atk-s0511a9:86_0: Tattha pabhā niddhāvatīti tassa sarīrato pabhā nikkhamati.
atk-s0511a9:86_1: Sarīrappabhā panassa niccakālaṁ dvādasayojanappamāṇaṁ padesaṁ pharitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0511a9:86_3: Sabbaṁtamantarahitanti vuttappakāraṁ sabbampi aniccamukhaṁ paviṭṭhaṁ vinaṭṭhanti attho.
atk-s0511a9:86_5: tassa nanu rittakā tucchakāyeva sabbe saṅkhārāti attho.
atk-s0511a9:87_0: Imassa pana anomadassissa bhagavato santike sāriputto ca mahāmoggallāno cāti ime dve aggasāvakā aggasāvakabhāvatthāya paṇidhānamakaṁsu.
atk-s0511a9:87_1: Imesaṁ pana therānaṁ vatthu cettha kathetabbaṁ.
